entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The entity responsible for the Plan and its administration, with absolute discretion to amend or discontinue participation in the Plan.

entities.name: NVIDIA MEXICO
entities.description: NV Computing Mexico, S. de R.L. de C.V., referred to as NVIDIA Mexico, is the recipient of services and does not establish any rights between the Plan and the participant.

relationships.relationship_description: The Company administers the Plan, and the participant's relationship with the Plan does not establish any rights between the participant and NVIDIA Mexico.
